name: Old Billy Schmidt - and the Legend of Zexylvexzalvydr
name_original: Old Billy Schmidt - and the Legend of Zexylvexzalvydr
description: Play as Ol' Billy Schimdt the loveable alcoholic that doesn't look anything like mario as he stumbles through procedurally generated dungeons killing monsters, slurpin' potions, buying fucking tight ass weapons, on his ultimate quest to defeat Zexylvexza-uuuhhh...something. It's a rogue-like! I never added sound to this game because I lost motivation, but I put a lot of work into it, so here it is.
